SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Accounts
This class is used to store all relevant information related to accounts.

Accounts data is stored in the accountsdata.json file.

Account registration and login are handled by the Accounts.registerAccount(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) and Accounts.login(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) methods respectively.

A variety of getter and setter methods are also provided to obtain and modify account information.
GameControl
The GameControl class is responsible for managing the game's state, including player accounts, level progression, and the game display.
GameDisplay
The GameDisplay class represents the main frame for displaying the game interface.
HighScore
The HighScore class extends JFrame and is responsible for displaying a window with a table of high scores.
Level
Class creates a level and controls the logic and questions provided.
LevelMenu
Represents the level selection menu in the "Cosmic Quest: Stellar Treasures" game.
LevelMenuSpecial
The LevelMenuSpecial class provides a graphical interface for the instructors and the developers This page will have all the planets already unlocked which is a special feature uniques to the instructor and developer.
LevelProgress
Class tracks level progress and implements methods to modify and obtain level information.
LoginForm
The LoginForm class represents the login form for the "Cosmic Quest: Stellar Treasures" application.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the application.
MainMenu
This class creates the main menu for the Cosmic Quest: Stellar Treasures game.
MainMenuInstructor
The MainMenuInstructor class represents the main menu of the game for instructors.
MainMenuSoftware
Constructs the main menu for our game facilitating navigation through various game options.
OptionsMenu
Defines the options menu for "Cosmic Quest: Stellar Treasures", allowing users to adjust settings such as sound levels (master, sound effects, music) and display brightness.
PauseMenu
Constructs the pause menu for our game facilitating navigation through various game options.
PlayerScore
Represents a player's score in the game.
Question
Class contains logic related to question implementation.
ScoreBoard
The ScoreBoard class represents a dialog displaying player's score.
SignupForm
The SignupForm class represents the signup form for creating a new account in the game.
TestAccounts
Class tests the key logical components in Accounts.
TestHighScore
Class tests the key logical components in HighScore.
TestLevelProgress
Class tests the key logical components in LevelProgress.
